import React from 'react' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import {Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, ListGroupItem} from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import products from '../products' const ProductScreen = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const product = products.find((p)=> Number(p._id) === Number(id)) return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 price: ${product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: {} ) } export default ProductScreen
